resources.string:
Welcome to Cheek Defender.
This app is meant for those who suffer from dropped calls due to their fatty cheek touching the End button.
When activated, your screen will be locked upon making or recieving a call.
Hit "Back" button to go back to active call. From there hit "Back" again, or choose from notification bar to Relock.
Enjoy.
If you like this app, please consider donating on my website or buying donation version. Thanks.
Thank you for supporting my work!
